name: Real Roller Coaster Simulator Free
description:
Is You Passionate about to fly in Air ?
Your Dreams comes true.
Feel the excitement of riding a roller coaster.
Exciting roller coaster experience with loops and dives and other insane stunts.
Realize yourself in a Train that is running on a Rolling track.
Sometime you may even scare because you will really feel like a Roller Coaster Slide, Sharp turns and Slopes.


How to Play:
swipe right/left to view right/left
swipe Up/Down to view Up/Down


Key Features;
- 360 degree rotation
- Stunning 3D Graphics
- Addictive Game Play
- Swipe-based control system!
- Advanced graphics!
- Play it anytime,anywhere!
- Dynamic music won't let you get bore
